name: Tez Tour  RU & CIS
name_aliases: tez-tour, teztour, тезтур, тэзтур, тэз тур, тез тур, ntp neh, ntpneh, еуяещгк, еуя ещгук, teztur,
description:
TEZ TOUR RU & CIS affiliate campaign

Please note that at the moment on the side of Admitad there is no technical possibility of marking online advertisement and submitting data to the Online Advertising Register in the offer.
 

TEZ TOUR - international tour operator which organize tours for tourists from Russia and CIS. TEZ TOUR was founded in 1994.

Today Tez Tour offers wide range of packaged tours to Austria, Andorra, Belarus, Bulgari, Hungary, Greece, Georgia, Dominican Republic, Indonesia, Egypt, Spain, Italy, China, Cyprus, Cuba, Latvia, Lithuania, Maldives, Mexica, UAE, Portugal, Russia, Seychelles, Portugal, Russia, Seychelles ,Thailand, Turkey, France, Chezh Republic, Sri Lanka, Estonia.

Why you should work with the program:


	well known brand and trust of tourists
	a wide range of tours for any choice
	get paid for tours and hotels


Important:

1. Only online orders are commissionable; Orders which were made and paid in offline offices are non-commissionable.

2. Only tours with departure from Russia, Kazakhstan and Belarus are commissionable (please note that a user should choose "Russia" or "Kazakhstan" as a region at the website).

3. A higher payout is paid for a tour from promo-regions (listed below).

Promo-regions:


	Bashkortostan
	Belarus
	Belgorod
	Chelyabinsk

Join the program and earn more with Tez Tour RU & CIS!

name: Italiarail [CPS] Many GEOs
name_aliases: Italiarail, italia rail, italiarailcom, italiarail com, шефдшфкфшд, шефдшф кфшд, шефдшфкфшдсщь, шефдшфкфшд сщь
description:
The largest international seller of train tickets in Italy.


	Italiarail is the expert in seamless train travel within Italy
	Guaranteed lowest prices
	24-hour customer support
	ItaliaRail.com offers an exclusive luggage service as well as discounted sightseeing and hotels
	Multi-currency payment options
	Instant electronic tickets
	Special group rates for students and educators that are up to 80% off the regular price


It's possible to buy tickets around Italy from €9.90/€19.90/€29.90 from www.italiarail.com who connect directly to the Trenitalia ticketing system.Customers can also buy in €, £ or $. 

Booking opens 180 days ahead for most long-distance trains in Italy, except when the mid-June & mid-December timetable changes intervene.  All international credit cards accepted, and customer either just quote their booking reference on board the train. www.italiarail.com is easier to use, all in plain English with English-language place names - and it can be cheaper then Trenitalia.com if there are 2 or more of you.  

After recent improvements it's a better system than Trenitalia in many ways:  It shows a whole day's trains in the search results not just an hour or two, it can book up to 20 people at a time, Trenitalia only books up to 5 people, it highlights the cheapest trains and trains where 1st class is cheaper than 2nd as a free upgrade.

Although www.italiarail.com accesses exactly the same prices as Trenitalia, it can be cheaper for 2 or more people travelling together because it can combine the last remaining tickets at a cheaper price level with tickets at a higher level within the same booking.  Trenitalia can't, so will ignore any remaining tickets at the cheaper price level if there aren't enough for all the passengers travelling. 

Online sales include train tickets.

_ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ __ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _

Il più grande venditore dei biglietti in Italia.


	Italiarail è un esperto in viaggi in Italia;
	Garanzia dei prezzi più bassi;
	Assistenza per i consumatori 24-ore;
	ItaliaRail.com offre un esclusivo servizio bagagli, visite turistiche scontate e albergi;
	Opzioni di pagamento multi-valuta;
	Biglietti elettronici imediati;
	Tariffe speciale meno 80% dal prezzo standart per gli studenti e educatori.


È possibile comprare biglietti in giro per Italia dal €9.90/€19.90/€29.90 sul www.italiarail.com che è conetto direttamente con sistema dei biglietti Trenitalia.

Consumatori possono pagare in €, £ or $. La prenotazione apre 180 giorni in aticipo per la maggior parte dei treni a lunga distanza in Italia, tranne quando intervengono i cambiamenti di orario di metà giugno e metà dicembre.

Sono accettate tutte le carte di credito internazionali.

Può essere più economico di Trenitalia.com a 2 volte.

Dopo miglioramenti recenti è migliore di Trenitalia in molti modi: in risultati di ricerca dimostra i treni non solo per una o due ore, ma per tutto il giorno.

C’è possibilità di fare prenotazione per 20 persone ad una volta,Trenitalia fa prenotazioni solo per 5 persone ad una volta.

Dimostra i prezzi più bassi per i treni. Anche dimostra dove il prezzo per 1 classse è più basso di 2 classe.

Anche www.italiarail.com da acesso con ai prezzi gli stessi come in Trenitalia.

Il prezzo può essere più economico per 2 o di più persone che viaggiano insieme perché si può combinare gli ultimi biglietti rimasti ad un livello di prezzo più basso con biglietti di livello superiore all'interno della stessa prenotazione.

name: Слетать.ру
description:
Слетать.ру — сервис сравнения туров от всех крупных туроператоров. Слетать.ру — это туры по всему миру и по России, на платформе есть путешествия на любой вкус: на море, на горнолыжные курорты, экскурсионные и авторские туры. И все это можно купить онлайн и оплатить банковской картой.
Компания Слетать.ру существует с 2010 года и является одним из лидеров отрасли. На сайт Слетать.ру в поисках выгодных туров заходят 1,5 млн уникальных посетителей в месяц. 


Информация по целевой аудитории: 

Топ 5 стран в которых отдыхали больше всего (без России):
-Турция
-Египет
-ОАЭ
-Абхазия
-Доминикана

Топ 5 направлений по России:
-Адлер
-Сочи
-Санкт-Петербург
-Красная поляна
-Анапа

Топ 5 городов вылета из России:
-Москва
-Санкт-Петербург
-Екатеринбург
-Казань
-Нижний Новгород

Процентное соотношение кол-ва туристов в туре:
1. 48,8% 1 человек в туре;
2. 31,69% 2 человека в туре;
3. 12,85% 3 человека в туре;
4. 6,5% 4 и больше

Пол туристов:
1. Женщины 57%
2. Мужчины 43%

Возраст туристов:
1. 30 лет
2. 40 лет
3. 20 лет

Звездность бронируемых отелей:
1. 5* - 43,06% туристов;
2. 4* - 25,86% туристов;
3. 3* - 24,93% туристов;

Преимущества для пользователей:
1. Своя сеть туристических агентств по всей России;
2. Сопровождение клиентов менеджером на всех этапах оформления тура;
3. На нашем сайте можно приобрести как пакетные туры, так и отдельно отели, авиабилеты, а также экскурсионные туры; 
4. Цены точно такие же, как у туроператоров! Клиенту нет необходимости самостоятельно искать и сравнивать туры у каждого туроператора по отдельности, все варианты представлены у нас на сайте. 
5. Есть возможность оформления туров в рассрочку;
6. Комиссия зависит от подтвержденных заявок! Есть возможность увеличить свой доход вместе с нами;
7. Индивидуальный подход к веб-мастерам: можем предоставить именной промокод, или доп. скидку для различных активностей;

name: Sanatoriums
description:
Please note that at the moment on the side of Admitad there is no technical possibility of marking online advertisement and submitting data to the Online Advertising Register in the offer.

Sanatoriums.com – the largest online portal for choosing and booking spa hotels in the best medical resorts in the world. The service provides unique tools for finding the optimal resort and hotel according to the client's indications, flexible and favorable booking conditions, and the organization of additional services for therapeutic recreation.

 

Benefits of cooperation with sanatoriums.com for partners

– High rates of the average booking amount – 1500 EUR

– 40% RevShare commission. Average booking commission 4.5%

– The best earning offers are available at the link https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/12pnNAVd7ZcvE8X0mDypodqZFBwls9A8pDX4Az9LUI7Y/edit#gid=0

– Cookies are stored for 30 days

– The most recognizable brand in medical tourism, present on the market since 2013

– Partners are allowed to use the company's videos and photos on their resources (without removing the watermark)

 

Benefits of cooperation with sanatoriums.com for clients

– Booking with payment at check-in and free cancellation

– Instant booking confirmation

– Possibility to pay by card online

– Search for hotels and resorts by client's diseases

– Videos about resorts and hotels

– Support of clients at all stages of medical stay

– Free consultations of a balneologist

– Excursions, transfers and other additional services

– The lowest prices for accommodation with a treatment package

– The site presents only the best of the best hotels

 

Geographic location of clients

– Ukraine, Russia, Belarus, Kazakhstan, Turkmenistan, Moldova, Azerbaijan, Armenia, Georgia and other CIS countries

– Germany

– Lithuania, Latvia and Estonia

– Other EU countries

– Israel

– USA and Canada

 

Customer language

– Ukrainian, Russian, German, English and others

 

The target audience

– People over 55

– Lovers of a healthy lifestyle

– People with health problems

 

Information about generating additional banners by webmasters:

To download a banner, you need to generate its URL, consisting of 6 parts. In general, the link to the banner looks like this: https://prod.affsanatoriums.com/images/banners/v1/{dimension}-{geoId}-{pageType}-{language}.{extension}. Let's look at the parts:

 

1. The static part https://prod.affsanatoriums.com/images/banners/v1/ is always unchanged.

2. Next step: add the banner size you need (aka {dimension}) from the table to the URL, for example, 725x90.

3. Then from the table {geoId} we add the ID of the country or resort to the URL.

4. Then add the banner type from the {pageType} table to the URL, on which the text will depend.

5. Next, from the {language} table, add the language of the banner text: Russian, German, English or Czech.

6. Next, after the dot, add the image format from the {extension} table: .png or .jpeg.

 

An example of a banner that you should get:

https://prod.affsanatoriums.com/images/banners/v1/725x90-CZE_FL-mainpage-de.jpeg

name: Travel Supermarket UK
description:
Who Are We?

TravelSupermarket is a travel site which offers people in the UK all the comparison tools they need when they’re planning their holiday and want to find the very best one for them.

We compare Package Holidays, Car Hire, Flights, Hotels, Holiday xtras, Travel Insurance and dynamic packaging by searching hundreds of travel websites. The information supplied is unbiased and designed to save our customers time and money.

We thrive on offering our users accurate real-time availability by taking information directly from suppliers such as Opodo, British Airways, First Choice, Thomson, Holiday Autos, Auto-Europe and many more, ensuring users are presented the best possible price at all times.

TravelSupermarket is part of the MoneySupermarket.com Group PLC.

Our affiliate scheme will focus on click outs to our partner sites on our Holidays and Car Hire channels and sales to our Hotels and Travel Insurance channels.

Why Work With Us?


	We search 1,000s of individual Package Holidays from over 34 suppliers
	We search over 200 individual Car Hire providers from over 21 suppliers
	We partner with Hotelscombined to source great Hotel deals, in the UK and abroad
	We search 400+ holiday insurance policies from over 50 providers.
	70% visit to click out rate on average
	Site visitors pre Corona: 1 million unique visits per month
	Ability to deep link directly to our results pages


How to populate offers from TravelSupermarket

We ensure all internal tracking parameters such as Google Analytics UTM and our own source codes are auto appended by Admitad. This means that all you have to do is find the right link for your activity, easy.

For detailed promotional information, please refer to the Publisher pack in the Documents section of the TravelSupermarket profile

Hotels

Option 1: Generic Hotels landing page


	Link directly to the Hotels landing page: https://hotels-affiliates.travelsupermarket.com/


Option 2: Deeplink to the destination search result

To do this take the link to our Hotels landing page (see URL above), populate the destination and date and hit search to get the deeplink URL. Keep in mind that once the date of departure has expired the user will be redirected to the generic destination landing page. See an example below of what this will look like for London Hotel searches:


	https://hotels-affiliates.travelsupermarket.com/hotels/London,England,United-Kingdom-c28501/2022-01-01/2022-01-02/2adults?placeId=P158584&placeName=place:London&sort=rank_a


 


	Redirecting deeplink into the generic destination page (default) upon date expiration
	
		https://hotels-affiliates.travelsupermarket.com/Place/London.htm
	
	


Option 3: Deeplink into the specific Hotels page


	Lastly, you can also link to a named hotel by destination. You can do this by populating the destination and dates within the gadget and hit search.
	Here is an example of what a URL will look like for this result:
	
		London:  https://hotels-affiliates.travelsupermarket.com/Place/London.htm
		Then select Hotel of choice i.e. Park Plaza Westminster Bridge London: https://hotels-affiliates.travelsupermarket.com/hotels/Park-Plaza-Westminster-Bridge-London,London-c28501-h315921-details/2022-01-01/2022-01-02/2adults?sid=HRGEHLKlW3#header
	
	


Car Hire

Option 1: Generic Car Hire landing page


	Link directly to the Car Hire landing page:  https://www.travelsupermarket.com/en-gb/car-hire/
	We wouldn’t advise on deeplinking to the search results page currently as we don’t have a dynamic rolling date variable within the URL, like for Holidays. Therefore, please avoid deeplinking to prevent expiration of search results once the date within the URL has elapsed.


Travel Insurance

Generic Travel Insurance landing page


	Link directly to the Travel Insurance landing page: https://www.travelsupermarket.com/en-gb/travel-insurance/


Holidays

Option 1: Generic Holidays landing page

Link users to our Holidays landing page using the following URL:


	https://www.travelsupermarket.com/en-gb/holidays/


Option 2: Deeplinking into search results


	To do this you will need to prepopulate the search gadget with:



	City of departure
	Destination
	Departure date
	Number of nights
	Number of people



	Click search and copy the URL link. This should look something like this:



	https://www.travelsupermarket.com/en-gb/holidays/results/5310a3fa823ab0522c0a32d4/54ad584b5218c8b2db215299/2017-11-06/7/?room=A2&f_min_guest_rating=3&preFilterTripAdvisor=true



	If you are deeplinking into the Search Results page, you will need to make the following date amend to the “Holidays link”: This is because existing Holiday URLs have a fixed date, therefore if you choose a specific date the URL will expire after that date has elapsed:


 


	https://www.travelsupermarket.com/en-gb/holidays/results/5310a3fa823ab0522c0a32d4/54ad584b5218c8b2db215299/2017-11-06/7/?room=A2&f_min_guest_rating=3&preFilterTripAdvisor=true



	In order to avoid this you will need to amend the date by replacing bold "2017-11-06" with "dynamic/14". This will ensure a 14-day rolling date. The URL structure should look something like this:



	https://www.travelsupermarket.com/en-gb/holidays/results/5310a3fa823ab0522c0a32d4/54ad584b5218c8b2db215299/dynamic/14/7/?room=A2&f_min_guest_rating=3&preFilterTripAdvisor=true


You are free to choose the length of time you would like the URL to roll over dates. For example, you can use 14 for a 14-day window, or 7 for 7 days, or 28 for 28 days.

Cookie Window

We operate a 30 days cookie window, except for Car hire and Holiday where we operate a 30-minute session window and last click attribution model. Only click outs and sales within this window will be validated.

TravelSupermarket do not allow site scrapes.

name: Oman Airway Global
name_aliases: omanair, oman airways, omanairways, oman, airway, omanairways, oman airway.
description:
Oman Air (WY), based in the beautiful capital city of Muscat, began operations in 1993. Initially founded to serve important domestic routes, they have since undergone rapid growth and today, we are proud to be recognized as a major international carrier connecting cities around the world to Oman’s stunning nature, rich heritage, and welcoming culture.

With a mission to highlight Oman as one of the Middle East’s most desirable travel destinations, while supporting adjacent commercial, industrial, and tourism activities, we continue to expand our impact and our global customer base.

From Oman Airways fleet of modern, fuel-efficient aircraft to our award-winning products and services, both in the air and on the ground, and our signature Omani hospitality, we set new benchmarks for flying while providing memorable travel experiences for our valued guests.
Oman Air offers luxurious travel experiences across the globe. Our airline is known for its exceptional service, comfort, and connectivity. We operate flights to a variety of destinations including Europe, Asia, and the Middle East.

	Preferences: Our customers value comfort, premium services, and seamless connectivity, which are reflected in our cabin features and in-flight services.
	Travel Purpose: Our customer base includes both leisure and business travelers.
	
	Brand bidding is stricktly prohibitted. 
	Plaese find a Negative keywords list here:  storage/2024/09/13/Oman_Air_negative_keywords_list.xlsx

name: Armatatour RU
name_aliases: https://armatatour.ru, Armatatour RU, армататур, fhvfnfneh, фкьфефещгк, тур, туры, танк, Армата-Тур
description:
База активного отдыха «Армата-Тур» — это команда профессионалов, увлечённых активным отдыхом и экстремальными приключениями.
Мы работаем с 2015 года и за это время превратили нашу площадку в уникальное место, где каждый человек может открыть для себя новый мир эмоций.

Наши инструкторы и организаторы — это люди, которые живут драйвом и приключениями, и готовы делиться этой энергией с каждым гостем.

Наша цель и миссия
Мы создаем уникальные туры и программы, которые позволяют каждому участнику почувствовать настоящий драйв и адреналин.
Главное для нас — подарить людям яркие эмоции и впечатления, которые останутся в памяти на долгие годы.

Мы хотим, чтобы каждый наш гость:


	провёл время весело и безопасно;
	попробовал новые активности;
	преодолел свои страхи и вышел за пределы привычного;
	зарядился энергией и радостью.


Мы верим, что активный отдых помогает открыть новые грани собственных возможностей и наполняет жизнь особыми впечатлениями!

По ЦА (танки/бигфуты) - соотношение сохраняется  

Женщины 27 - 45 лет - 70% клиентов - приобретают в основном в подарок семье/друзьям, средний чек 32 000.

Мужчины 27 - 55 лет - 30% клиентов - в основном для себя/семьи, активный отдых/развлечения, средний чек 36 000.

Компании/ивент агенства/hrd -  организация корпоратива/тимбилдинга - средний чек 450 000. 

Продукты

Танки -  https://armatatour.ru/
Квадроциклы Бигфуты - https://armatatour.ru/kvadro-new
Корпоративы - https://armatatour.ru/corporate

Каждый год нашу базу посещают более 10 000 туристов из стран Ближнего Востока и Китая.
В 80% через гидов и 20% находят нас сами (гидов тоже можно и нужно привлекать с них жирнее чеки)

Переводы:

Английский - https://armatatour.ru/english
Китайский - https://armatatour.ru/china
Арабский - https://armatatour.ru/arab
